attributes.action: introduce a law from immediate effect to protect the elderly from abuse and give them the same protection we give to our children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Elderly people are suffering from physical, psychological, financial and sexual abuse not to mention neglect and there's no legislation to protect them. Their vulnerability should be recognised and legislation introduced to deter criminal activity. We protect our precious children with legislation so why not our elderly?

rejection.details: It is illegal to subject elderly people to abuse.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
